sentences.sContent: He wants to take on that boxing champion.
sentences.sCn: 他想和那个拳击冠军较量。

sentences.sContent: When he joined in the boxing I used to second him.
sentences.sCn: 在他参加拳击比赛期间，我一直是他的拳击指导。

sentences.sContent: Although much less experienced, he gave a good account of him self in the boxing match.
sentences.sCn: 他虽然很缺乏经验，但在拳击比赛中仍大显身手。

synos.tran: 拳击；[交]装箱；围模；[轻]做箱的材料

phrases.pCn: n. 节礼日；圣诞节后的第一个工作日
太极拳；拳坛暗影；拳击练习

trans.tranOther: the sport of fighting while wearing big leather  glove s
